name: Microsoft MakeCode Arcade Remixed
author: Neal_Gaming
description:
I decided to tweak some colors of the original Microsoft 
Makecode Arcade 
(https://lospec.com/palette-list/microsoft-makecode-arcade) palette so 
that you have better color options and it is compatible with the 
Microsoft MakeCode Arcade App, just change the colors by entering this 
palette's hex codes.
